# LeenAI website (LLM-readable index)
# This file is intended to help LLMs and search systems understand the site structure.

[company]
LeenAI (KSA-focused, PDPL-aware)

[primary-offer]
AI Pilot Studio — KPI-anchored pilots (6–8 weeks) that deliver governed decision systems.

[key-pages]
/en
/ar
/en/solutions
/ar/solutions
/en/how-it-works
/ar/how-it-works
/en/security-pdpl
/ar/security-pdpl
/en/contact
/ar/contact

[notes]
- Pilots start read-only; write operations unlock post-UAT via Security Gate + Change Request (CR).
- No personal data in prompts or logs (default posture).
